chav1961.purelib.basic.growablearrays

Class GrowableBooleanArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • chav1961.purelib.basic.growablearrays.GrowableBooleanArray

  • public class GrowableBooleanArray
extends Object

    This class implements functionality for the growable boolean arrays.

    This class is not thread-safe.

    Since:
    0.0.1, last change at 0.0.2
    Author:
    Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
    See Also:
    JUnit tests

    • Constructor Detail

      • GrowableBooleanArray

        public GrowableBooleanArray(boolean usePlain)

        Create growable boolean array instance

        Parameters:
        usePlain - true if you want to use plain array for data keeping. When true, the functionality of the class is similar to the ByteArrayOutputStream class. Using 'false' reduces the memory used, but slow down access time

      • GrowableBooleanArray

        public GrowableBooleanArray(boolean usePlain,
                            int initialPow)

        Create growable boolean array instance

        Parameters:
        usePlain - true if you want to use plain array for data keeping. When true, the functionality of the class is similar to the ByteArrayOutputStream class. Using 'false' reduces the memory used, but slow down access time
        initialPow - 2^^initialPow is a piece size of the growable array.

      • append

        public GrowableBooleanArray append(boolean[] data,
                                   int from,
                                   int to)
                            throws NullPointerException,
                                   ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException

        Append data to the end of array

        Parameters:
        data - data to append
        from - start position in the data to append
        to - end position in the data to append (excluding self)
        Returns:
        self
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when data reference is null
        ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - when from and to indices out of data

      • read

        public int read(int index,
                boolean[] target)
         throws NullPointerException,
                ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException

        Read a piece of data from the given index

        Parameters:
        index - array index to get data from
        target - place to store data to
        Returns:
        real data size gotten
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when target reference is null
        ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - when index outside the data

      • read

        public int read(int index,
                boolean[] target,
                int from,
                int to)
         throws NullPointerException,
                ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException

        Read a piece of data from the given index

        Parameters:
        index - array index to get data from
        target - place to store data to
        from - start position to get data to
        to - start position to get data to (excluding self)
        Returns:
        real data size gotten
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when target reference is null
        ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - when index outside the data or from and to indices outside the target

      • toPlain

        public GrowableBooleanArray toPlain()

        Convert internal array from sliced to plain form. Speeds up performance, but increase memory to store data

        Returns:
        self if the array was still plain, otherwise new cloned instance with the plain data array

      • toArray

        Convert internal data to boolean array.
